alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 05 at 12:04AM AKDT until November 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING TO 9 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...High surf expected. * WHERE...South and west facing shores of the Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 10 PM AKDT Saturday to 9 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Waves will wash to the top of the beach. Beach erosion will occur. Ice may push onto the beach. Minor flooding is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds of 50 mph will cause high surf. Since the winds will be offshore at Shishmaref, there may be erosion on the lagoon side at Shishmaref, and not on the ocean side. Kivalina and Point Hope will be the most heavily impacted.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
